reviewText:
I'm from the days when the 70's kung-fu movies was on 42nd street, here in New York.
This is one movie I was waiting for on dvd.
I like the movie, but HATED the copy I received in the mail.
How could someone put this terrible copy on the market.
DVD is supose to play clear.
My copy looks as if it was a very very bad VHS tape.
Even with the lights out, I couldn't make sense of it, with the bad lighting & color.
When this become available in a clear, widescreen and colorful format, then put on the market, not before..
